name: ClearCoffeeMug
bt_task: The robot task is to clear the coffee mug. The behavior logic of a robot should be as follows. The scene of the task is the kitchen. There is a mug on the countertop, with a small amount of coffee remained inside. The robot is initially in the kitchen. The robot needs to empty the mug and pour the remained coffee into the sink. Then robot needs to places the mug inside the dishwasher. The goal is to ensure that the mug has no coffee remained and it is placed inside the dishwasher.

Move_to_mug.description: The robot moves to the location of the mug.

Grasp_mug.description: The robot grasps and lifts the mug with its one gripper firmly.

Move_to_sink.description: The robot moves to the location of the sink.

Move_to_dishwasher.description: The robot moves from to the dishwasher.

Place_mug_in_dishwasher.description: The robot places the mug that is held by its gripper inside the dishwasher. Then the robot releases its gripper and retracts it.

Open_the_diswasher_door.description: The robot extends one free gripper and opens the door of the dishwasher.

condition_node.robot_is_near_mug?: Check if the robot is near the mug on the countertop. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.robot_is_near_sink?: Check if the robot is near the sink. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.robot_is_near_dishwasher?: Check if the robot is near the dishwasher. Require a distance of less than 0.5 meter to be considered near.
condition_node.mug_in_gripper?: Check if the the mug is in the robot's gripper.
condition_node.mug_has_no_coffee?: Check if the coffee cup is empty and there is no coffee remained inside.
condition_node.mug_is_in_dishwasher?: Check if the mug is inside the dishwasher.
condition_node.dishwasher_door_open?: Check if the door of the dishwasher is open.
